title: The North wind and the sun: an Aesop fable
creator_credit: Gakken Company and Coronet Instructional Films
brief_description: Combining old world and modern elements, this colorful animated film tells the story of a contest between the north wind and the sun. “You can sometimes do more by being gentle than you can by using force” is the useful lesson children will gain from this film.
